content: * please note this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com * the country cottage headband is a quick and easy crochet headband / ear warmer that features beautiful texture and can be made any size the instructions include 8 sizes ranging from newborn to adult large and tells you how to adjust the length and width to be perfect for you the country cottage headband is double thick making it super warm and cozy this will be the perfect accessory for cold winter days and will be a great quick gift for the holidays difficulty advanced beginner / easy standard us crochet terms pattern includes - detailed written instructions - instructions for 8 sizes 0-3 m 3-6 m 6-12 m 1-3 y child/teen adult small adult medium adult large - gauge pattern - link to the free video tutorial - special stitch instructions with photos - photos for reference supplies needed medium 4 weight yarn 5 50mm i hook yarn needle and scissors
